abstractText: Estimate of the extent ofthe understory that is covered with vegetation and the extent ofthe understory that is devoid of vegetation.Estimates of cover are taken at 5 transects (1, 6, 11, 16, 21) on the right and left bankwithin a10mx10mplot beginning atbankfull. Percent of the areal coverage ofthe understory (0.5-5m) is visually estimated for each plot.Percent Understory Cover is an average of the estimates from each of these 10 plots. PercentUnderstory NoCoveris100-PercentUnderstory Cover.The CHaMP - Riparian Structure Method provides background on the measurements that are analyzed for this calculation. See - http://www.monitoringmethods.org/Method/Details/845 CHaMP method follows the Peck et al. (2001) methods used by the EMAP.
title: Percent Understory Cover and Percent No Understory Cover v1.0
